name: Siege Commander

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Craft (siege weapon) 5 ranks, Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks or Profession (siege engineer) 1 rank.

sections.body: When you lead a siege engine assembly crew, you grant all of its members a +4 competence bonus on checks to assemble or move the weapon. You also halve the time required to assemble a siege engine.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Under your leadership, the time required to assemble and move a siege engine is greatly reduced.
